function-usage.testenviron: In order to try out the examples, start a command shell and move to folder $FOXPATH/examples-data/oxygen-samples.

example.label: no filter
example.description: Get the names and frequencies of the child elements of docbook root elements.

example.label: name filter
example.description: Get the names and frequencies of elements which have section child elements - 'section', 'sect1', 'sect2', ...

example.label: option name
example.description: Get the names and frequencies of docbook elements containing mml elements.
